comment._content:
if there is anything left today of what we see in this picture, it would be great to see a picture of this place at present, as oppose to this one.
however, the details are extraordinary, this is a treasure!

comment._content: miracola: Here is a link to a photograph in our photo database, taken in August 2001. The angle is not quite the same, but you can still compare some of the buildings. www.kms.raa.se/cocoon/bild/show-image.html?id=16000300032329 /Anna B.
